title: Grum:Twitch直播现在支持OSX 10.7
author: a20001017
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2013-12-6 20:09 编辑 

_grum:We've just updated the Twitch libraries for 13w49a, they might work with streaming from OSX 10.7! Could someone try and let us know? :D

Grum:我们刚刚在13w49a中更新了Twitch的库文件，现在大概或许有可能能在OSX 10.7上直播了！谁来当小白鼠？ :D

注释:OSX即Mac，开发代号为“狮”，最新正式版为10.8，测试版10.9已经可被普通用户下载

replies.author: Aikawastep
replies.txt_content: {:10_495:}刚刚看见XP要被放弃，OLO，现在来一个支持...[我是XP党啊]

replies.author: a20001017
replies.txt_content:
